description: This file defines the main React component 'RootApp' that orchestrates user login, game selection, and game display for a game suite UI. It manages internal state for user session, selected game, and view mode, and composes various components like Navbar, EnvBanner, and individual game components.

methods.name: RootApp()
methods.description: Main exported React component that wraps the application with user context and manages the overall flow.

methods.name: RootFlow()
methods.description: Internal React component that manages view state, user login/logout, game selection, and rendering appropriate sections.

methods.name: onLogin
methods.description: Handles user login; updates user context and switches view to game selection.

methods.name: onSelectGame
methods.description: Handles game selection; updates active tab and switches to game view.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout; resets user context and returns to login view.
